data.lyric:
[ti:Silence]
[ar:Marshmello/Khalid]
[al:Silence]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Silence - Marshmello (棉花糖)/Khalid
[00:06.70]Written by：Marshmello/Khalid Robinson
[00:13.41]Yeah I'd rather be a lover than a fighter
[00:15.67]
[00:16.91]'Cause all my life I've been fighting
[00:19.34]
[00:20.09]Never felt a feeling of comfort
[00:23.21]All this time I've been hiding
[00:25.96]
[00:26.52]And I never had someone to call my own oh nah
[00:30.26]
[00:30.83]I'm so used to sharing
[00:32.89]
[00:33.94]Love only left me alone
[00:36.28]
[00:36.86]But I'm at one with the silence
[00:40.98]I found peace in your violence
[00:44.20]Can't show me there's no point in tryin'
[00:47.37]
[00:48.19]I'm at one and I've been quiet for too long
[00:54.08]
[00:54.90]I found peace in your violence
[00:57.72]Can't show me there's no point in tryin'
[01:00.92]
[01:01.81]I'm at one and I've been silent for too long
[01:07.00]
[01:11.05]I've been quiet for too long
[01:14.34]
[01:17.83]I've been quiet for too long
[01:21.10]
[01:22.21]I found peace in your violence
[01:24.72]Can't show me there's no point in trying
[01:27.98]
[01:28.96]I'm at one and I've been quiet for too long
[01:34.62]
[01:35.34]I'm in need of a savior but I'm not asking for favors
[01:40.44]
[01:41.01]My whole life I felt like a burden
[01:43.78]
[01:44.62]I think too much and I hate it
[01:47.16]
[01:47.93]I'm so used to being in the wrong I'm tired of caring
[01:54.08]
[01:54.99]Loving never gave me a home so I sit here in the silence
[02:01.84]
[02:02.69]I found peace in your violence
[02:05.10]Can't show me there's no point in tryin'
[02:08.67]
[02:09.34]I'm at one and I've been quiet for too long
[02:15.25]
[02:16.07]I found peace in your violence
[02:18.86]Can't show me there's no point in tryin'
[02:22.26]
[02:22.96]I'm at one and I've been silent for too long
[02:28.99]
[02:33.14]I've been quiet for too long
[02:35.48]
[02:39.05]I've been quiet for too long
[02:42.29]
[02:43.36]I found peace in your violence
[02:45.66]Can't show me there's no point in trying
[02:49.21]
[02:50.10]I'm at one and I've been quiet for too long
